COMMONWEALTH BANK
Business & Commercial Banking
CONSTRUCTION LOAN FACILITY AGREEMENT
LOAN FACILITY DETAILS
Borrower:
Sunset Construction Pty Ltd (ABN: 12 345 678 901)
Facility Type:
Construction Loan - Commercial Development
Facility Limit:
$650,000.00 AUD
Interest Rate:
6.50% p.a. (variable)
Loan Term:
12 months construction + 24 months interest-only
Commencement:
1 June 2024
Facility Fee:
1.5% of facility limit ($9,750)
DRAWDOWN SCHEDULE
Stage 1: Land Acquisition
$265,000
Completed 15/01/2024
Stage 2: Site Works & Foundation
$130,000
Completed 15/03/2024
Stage 3: Framing & Roof
$100,000
Available upon completion
Stage 4: Services & Fit-out
$100,000
Available upon completion
Stage 5: Final Completion
$55,000
Available upon final inspection
SECURITY
• First registered mortgage over land at 123 Sunset Boulevard, Sydney NSW 2000
• Fixed and floating charge over all assets of Sunset Construction Pty Ltd
• Personal guarantee from Michael Chen (Director) - $650,000
• Assignment of construct
